body:
The `_, _` line in the last example desugars to `_, _ = 1 << iota, 1 << iota - 1`.
What I'm getting at is that every line of the examples in the `iota` section has a (possibly implicit) `iota` identifier on the line. My proposal shows that `iota` increments even when it's not mentioned at all.

I'm not suggesting a new example, I'm just proposing changing a single line in the first example. If you don't think it's necessary that's fine, I just wanted to flag that (for me) it could have been clearer.
